entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:40 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
